docs.abstract: Lr from NYS Supt of Banking John G Heimann on June 14 ed concerning need to evaluate mortgage disclosure information; says NYS Banking Dept has issued regulation on mortgage disclosure that will permit evaluation of redlining; says Fed Govt should play large role in working with states on problem
